name: resend-mcp
description: Send transactional and marketing emails via Resend API. Simple, reliable email delivery for your applications.

metadata.mesh_description: The Resend MCP provides seamless integration with Resend's email API, enabling AI agents to send transactional and marketing emails programmatically. Supports HTML and plain text emails, multiple recipients (to/cc/bcc), custom headers, and reply-to addresses. Perfect for building automated notification systems, email marketing workflows, contact form handlers, and transactional email triggers.
